alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 9:55AM PST until February 21 at 8:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes mostly above 4000 ft. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are likely. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles traveling along HWY 395 close to 4000ft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts at RAWS sites in the Eastern Sierra around 4000ft have gusted over 70 mph so far this morning and this is likely to continue through the afternoon hours. Occasionally, these gusts may lower to parts of HWY 395, becoming a significant hazard for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
